meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Fowlkes Chris Dunn Ernest Niño-Murcia Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6394.

td.p: Sarah Fowlkes, an attorney from Brooklyn, New York
Chris Dunn, a billing director from Shepherdsville, Kentucky
Ernest Niño-Murcia, a court interpreter originally from Iowa City, Iowa (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,599)

tr.td: IT'S THE BIGGEST IN AREA
I NEED SOME SPACE
U.S.A. TOUR
FOOD STUFF
INTERNET SLANG
ANTIHEROES

')
